```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

The package currently has XX AST rewriting rules. Here are a list of the
basic ones.

+-------------+--------------+--------------------+
| Description | Rockstar     | R                  |
+=============+==============+====================+
| Comment     | (Rad         | \# Rad comment     |
|             | comment)     |                    |
+-------------+--------------+--------------------+
| Not         | mysterious   | ?                  |
| assigned    |              |                    |
+-------------+--------------+--------------------+
| Null        | nothing,     | NULL               |
|             | nowhere,     |                    |
|             | nobody,      |                    |
|             | empty, gone  |                    |
+-------------+--------------+--------------------+
| True        | right, yes,  | TRUE               |
|             | ok           |                    |
+-------------+--------------+--------------------+
| False       | wrong, no,   | FALSE              |
|             | lies         |                    |
+-------------+--------------+--------------------+
| Assignment  | Put 3 into x | x \<- 3            |
|             |              |                    |
|             | Let 3 be x   |                    |
+-------------+--------------+--------------------+
